mapper.insert: insert into tblPlace (seq, subject, content, regdate) values (seqPlace.nextVal, #{subject}, #{content}, default)
insert into tblPic (seq, filename, pseq) values (seqPic.nextVal, #{filename}, #{pseq})
mapper.select: select a.*, (select count(*) from tblPic where pseq = a.seq) as picCount from tblPlace a order by seq desc
